title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 650 - Qualifications Of Operators Of Wasterwater Treatment Plants
content:

§ 650.1 - Purpose, applicability, and exemptions

§ 650.3 - Scoring system established
§ 650.4 - Certified operators required
§ 650.5 - Preliminary qualifications
§ 650.6 - Minimum operator qualifications
§ 650.7 - Certification and renewal procedures
§ 650.8 - Renewal requirements
§ 650.9 - Authority to alter requirements or to require examinations
§ 650.10 - Suspension or revocation of certificates
§ 650.11 - Status of previously approved operators
§ 650.12 - Tables
§ 650.13 to 650.14 - Repealed
§ 650.15 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 650

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 3-0301[1][bb], [2] [m], 17-0303

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
